nodes.text: Brad Narong was a Human male officer who served the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War against the resurgent Sith Empire.

Around 3641 BBY, he tried to fix some malfunctioning warden droids on Belsavis, but all the vital parts were stolen by a group of Mandalorian convicts, who then used the parts to build turret defenses. He tasked a Republic spacer to destroy the Mandalorian turrets and salvage the stolen droid parts from them so he can repair his droids.
